sentence: John Zorn (born September 2, 1953) is an American composer, arranger, record producer, saxophonist, and multi-instrumentalist with hundreds of album credits as performer, composer, and producer across a variety of genres including jazz, rock, Hardcore punk, classical, Surf music, Heavy metal music, soundtrack, Ambient music, and improvised music.
